title: Failing to Open
body: I'm looking at this board topic, and I can see that this is a problem for others; I am unable to get into league when attempting to log in.

replies.body: Can you provide a bit more detail? What errors do you see when you try to log in? Can you [grab a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) and send me a link to it?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=mPJ3zbdF,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-09-27T22:59:46.784+0000)
>
> Can you provide a bit more detail? What errors do you see when you try to log in? Can you [grab a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) and send me a link to it?

Here is a youtube video of what happens. I tried uninstalling league before this video and as you can see, it still happens.
https://youtu.be/2a-hs_5axO8

Thanks for providing that vid! This issue happens most often if there are problematic configurations in your local network settings. I strongly recommend ensuring these settings are solid by working through our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps resolved this issue.

I saw your other post and wanted to let you know that since you're still having problems, I'd like you to submit a support ticket with our [tech team.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

If you run a set of logs using our [Hextech Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach them to your ticket, it will give us more context on what's going on. Let me know if you have any other questions.
